metadata.title: CVE-2024-43485 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Denial of Service attack against System.Text.Json ExtensionData feature.

criterions.comment: dotnet6 package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
dotnet7: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'see notes').
dotnet8 package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
